start.text: This is my world. You are not welcome in my world!
We have you surrounded, at least from this side!
Scientists in the future have studied your ass for centuries - and sent me back in time to kick it!

retreat.text: Last one alive, lock the door!

out_of_missiles.text: All gave some, some gave all!

engaged.text: You're in a big fat hurry to die, son.
I joined this fleet just to kill maggots like you.
If you know what's good for ya, you will run!
I am going to strangle you with your own frilly training bra!

pursuing.text: You run fast, my bullets run faster.
Take your lumps like a man, Private Twinkletoes.

hull_50.text: You cannot kill me! I do not have time to bleed!
Pain is weakness leaving the body.
You call that breaking my spine?

hull_30.text: You are all weak. You are all bleeders.
If I have to crack some skulls, I will.
I will not tolerate failure on my ship.

overload.text: Are you all trying for a Section 8?
You are the sorriest excuses for sailors I have ever seen!

death.text: That was an amazing killing spree... by the other fleet!

victory.text: Time to inform your next of kin!
This is my rifle, this is my gun! You maggots stink and that's why we won!

victory_boss.text: If God had wanted you to live, He would not have created me!
Everyone of you deserves a medal!
